channel.title: Lyrics
channel.description: well all i can say is post ur own lyrics and best ones win :p good luck

item.title: Lyrics
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

[quote=“I,Parasite - Thirst”]It leaves me hurting,
spiteful
The dust throat longing
Choking
in true form hopeful,
bitter
The last cry pleading
verbal

The thirst comes
The face falls
It crumbles
the plain way
In plain view
it’s forced through
at arms length
I feel you
with gloves on
You see me
There’s no one
The thirst’s gone

Call me crazy
I provide life
All this fruit falls
All my life blind
Sweetened poison
Left to die
Dry the face
That’s not me
nor is it mine[/quote]

Read full topic
